channel.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [RBX2A][Managed vSphere] - Storage maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Dec 11, 07:30 - 22:00 UTC

Oct 23, 16:43 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer in RBX2A region.

Start time : 11/12/2025 07:30 UTC
End time : 11/12/2025 22:00 UTC
Service impact : There will be no impact on the vSphere UI, data availability, or virtual machines during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we are rolling out an update for multiple storage servers.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.title: [EU/CA][Hosted Private Cloud] - vSphere maintenance notification
item.description:
Oct 20, 07:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Oct 15, 23:37 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Managed vSphere offer.

Start time : 20/10/2025 07:00 UTC
End time : 24/10/2025 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere will not be accessible and the hosts will be put into maintenance mode during the operation.
If the host has virtual machines in it, a vMotion will be performed.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy, we will be doing a maintenance on our Managed vSphere offer.
An individual communication will be done to inform customers.
Customers can reschedule the operation through the manager.

Thank you for your understanding

item.title: [RBX2d][Managed vSphere] - Cluster10057 incident notification
item.description:
Oct 19, 10:15 UTC
Resolved - We would like to inform you that we had an incident on the specific Cluster10057 in RBX2d.
This incident has now been resolved.

Here is detail for this incident :
Start time : 19/10/2025 09:15 UTC
End time : 19/10/2025 09:43UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Cluster10057 was temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers were temporarily unable to access their data on the specified cluster.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by an electrical equipment issue.

We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

item.title: [RBX8][Managed vSphere] - Rack R805L19/R805L20/R805L21 incident Notification
item.description:
Oct 18, 22:11 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed vSphere offer on the specific racks R805L19/R805L20/R805L21 has been resolved.

We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our has been resolved.

Start time : 18/10/2025 17:00 UTC
End time : 18/10/2025 20:22 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 18, 20:41 UTC
Monitoring - Service has been fully restored since 18/10/2025 20:33 UTC. Monitoring remains active to ensure long-term stability.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 18/10/2025 20:13 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts were temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers were temporarily unable to access their hosts in the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident was caused by a cooling system issue.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 18, 17:57 UTC
Update - We are continuing to work on a fix for this issue.

Oct 18, 17:57 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed vSphere offer on the specific racks R805L19/R805L20/R805L21.

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 18/10/2025 17:00 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : Some hosts are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Some customers are temporarily unable to access their hosts in the specified racks.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by a cooling system issue.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

item.title: [RBX8][Managed vSphere] - Rack R808L21 incident notification
item.description:
Oct 16, 13:06 UTC
Resolved - We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Managed vSphere has been resolved.

Start time : 16/10/2025 08:53 UTC
End time : 16/10/2025 12:00 UTC
Root Cause : This incident was caused by this maintenance : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/dxt6sgnvc37v

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 16, 11:49 UTC
Update - We have new information regarding the incident that affected your service(s).

Please find below an update on the situation:
Update : A significant number of hosts are operational again.
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 16, 10:00 UTC
Identified - We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our Managed vSphere offer in the rack R808L21

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 16/10/2025 08:53 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All hosts located in the rack R808L21 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their hosts located in the specified rack.
Root Cause : This incident is caused by this maintenance : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/dxt6sgnvc37v
Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

Oct 16, 09:30 UTC
Investigating - We are currently investigating an incident affecting our Managed vSphere offering, which is causing temporary availability issue in the rack R808L21

Here are some supplementary details :

Start time : 16/10/2025 08:53 UTC
Impacted Service(s) : All hosts located in the rack R808L21 are temporarily unavailable.
Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to access and use their hosts located in the specified rack.
Ongoing Actions : Our teams are investigating to determine the origin of the incident to fix it.

We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.

We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.
